titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons, Woodhull Willing Workers Circle records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons

did.unittitle: International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons, Woodhull Willing Workers Circle records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Woodhull Willing Workers Circle of Christian interdenominational service organization supporting various ministries to children, to the aged, the handicapped, to those in hospital, and underprivileged.
archdesc.scopecontent: Minute books, 1916-1993; annual reports, 1925-2006 (scattered); programs to Shiawassee County Branch conventions, 1928-2000 (scattered); membership materials; clippings and scrapbooks; and some photographs.

corpname.primary_name: International Order of the King's Daughters and Sons
